title: Exposing 'Vaccine Misinformation' Mythology
cleaned_text:
The NZ medical authorities and mainstream media push their vaccine propaganda and continue to cry “misinformation” when serious concerns about the vaccine are raised. Some groups have declared the vaccine unfit for use in humans, but the authorities refuse to change their script…

New Zealand’s Dr. Sam Bailey revealed how the government, mainstream media, and academia – all collude to enforce broad control of speech and debate surrounding the disastrous experimental mRNA ‘vaccine’ roll-out. Watch:



 

 This video was first published on June 22, 2022

opengraph.title: Exposing 'Vaccine Misinformation' Mythology - 21st Century Wire
